title: Juffair Mall
data: Juffair Mall is a shopping mall in the Juffair neighbourhood of Manama, the capital city of Bahrain. The mall opened on 15 December 2015.[1] A Lulu Hypermarket opened there on 6 January 2016, the 120th Lulu store in the world.[2] The opening ceremony was patronised by Bahrain's Deputy Prime Minister, Shaikh Khalid bin Abdullah Al Khalifa.[3] This article about a building or structure in Bahrain is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about a shopping mall is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
